product_name: Otto Spring Gaiters - Unisex - Special Buy
long_description: The Otto Spring gaiters keep debris out of your boots when heading out on day hikes. Low ankle length seals off the top of your boot without covering your lower leg for improved ventilation. Lightweight nylon features a water-resistant coating that is highly breathable and water repellent; elastic-grip gathers at the top and bottom make a positive seal. Rear entry rip-and-stick closures make it easy to put the gaiters on without removing footwear. Front lace hooks and replacable instep cords keep the gaiters securely in place. Fits both high- and low-top summerweight footwear. Special buy.
short_description: The Otto Spring gaiters keep debris out of your boots when heading out on day hikes.
